Map.mapBrief:
The shadow of Hardin sneaks up on Orim, who hides himself in Gludio. what happened to them...

 - Protect the Black Magic Crystal Ball!
 - Block monsters attack within the time limit.

Rosas turned the beautiful Heine into a wasteland! Sealed on the island, but as the darkness grows stronger...

 - Defeat the monsters within the time limit!
 - Attack with the space-time wand from Geren
 - If your lucky you might find out the island's secrets...

Defeat the 4 Great Spirits and save the Unicorns in bondage! Give peace to the Unicorns who has been turned into Nightmares by the curse of the dreamy Succubus...

 - Defeat the monsters within the time limit!
 - If you fail to defeat the Great Spirits, a large number of monsters will invade.
 - If you encounter a Dreamy Succubus, beware of the Curse of Eternal Nightmare!

Defeat the Cultists of Darkness and purify the imprisoned Aurakia.

 - Defeat monsters within the time limit.
 - The restrained Aurakia needs the power of purification.
 - Check the Stone Statues when they change.
※Aurakia Purification can only be cleared once a week.
(Can not enter if you have Purified Jade Fragement)
